Bash(# Add tasks to the 2025-07-08 task list and close it
docker exec perfectme-db mysql -u root -ppassword perfectme -e ""
INSERT INTO tasks (task_list_id, title, description, percentage, position) VALUES 
(11, ''Morning Exercise'', ''Go for a 30-minute run'', 35.00, 1),
(11, ''Read Book'', ''Read 20 pages of current book'', 28.33, 2),
(11, ''Work on Project'', ''Complete feature implementation'', 21.67, 3),
(11, ''Call Family'', ''Weekly family check-in call'', 15.00, 4);

UPDATE task_lists SET is_closed = 1 WHERE id = 11;
"")
